content.name: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Mycu: Sector list
content.author: Mycu
content.description: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Adds list of known sectors to the map with current resources and buy/sell offers list.
